title: The Misadventures of Red Bear: Red Bear and the Indian Chief
description: This is a picture book for young children aged between 4 and 8 years old. The Misadventures of Red Bear is a series of colorful picture books. The first in the series is Red Bear and the Indian Chief. The characters are accessible, irresistible and endearing. The book teaches young children lessons about resilience, resourcefulness, loyalty, courage and kindness. These books are designed for adults to read to young children, but can also be read by older readers. The focus in the series is on adventure.
author: Paul G. Day
